events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's mention of requesting money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M., our specialist for refund cases.
Hello! I'm Sarah, here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, may I have the order number and a photo of the item you received?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I am attaching a photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund and you should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate how fast you handled the refund.
Your refund case is now resolved. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We wanted to follow up to confirm you received the refund successfully and are satisfied with the resolution.
Closing this refund case as resolved per your confirmation. Thank you for contacting support.
